column4: XNIT-01 you shouldnt need to be root to unrar a file...im quite certain of it in fact
true one shouldn't. Seems more like there are trouble to find unrar for him
it depends on how you installed your drivers in the first place.  Most repositories should auto update them.  if you run glxinfo | grep rendering does it say yes?
the warning is harmless.  You look to be in good shape as far as drivers go.
3D apps are gonna slow down while youre running beryl because it uses a lot of resources.
aye.. that is why I unloaded beryl and tried as well :)
